bibl.title: Greek Attacks against Alexandrian Jews During Emperor Trajan's Reign.
bibl.note: Suite de: C.P.J. II 158, 435 e la rivolta ebraica al tempo di Traiano, ZPE 51 (1983) pp. 95-103. - "The present research attempts a systematic reconstruction of the entire sequence of events underlying these texts." - Pp. 47-48: Appendix. The anti-Jewish character of the cult of Serapis.
Pucci Ben Zeev Marina, Greek Attacks against Alexandrian Jews During Emperor Trajan's Reign.
